short_description: dongguan geally refrigeration technology co. ltd. is an ice supplier based in dongguan, china.
long_description: dongguan geally refrigeration technology co.,ltd (geally for short),a professional ice making and refrigeration solution and equipment provider.the factory located in dongguan city which is well known as "world factory".geally achieves its production strictly according to iso9001:2008 management system,and the products are conform with ce manufacturing standard. geally have been committed to technological innovation in the ice industry, and insist on lean production and integrity management.
generated_description: dongguan geally refrigeration technology co., ltd. (geally) is a professional ice making and refrigeration solution and equipment provider with over 10 years of experience in designing and manufacturing ice making systems. the company has a sophisticated team that integrates research and development, production, sales, and after-sale services. geally has established the ice machine brand geally, which is mainly engaged in the production of flake ice machines, block ice machines for various industries such as supermarkets, food processing, seafood and aquatic products, industrial manufacturing, and concrete cooling. the products are widely used in ice factories, supermarkets, restaurants, fish docks, poultry factories, aquatic bases, fruit and vegetable preservation and transportation, chemical industries, concrete cooling, and various types of industrial or environmental cooling projects. geally is committed to technological innovation in the ice industry and insists on lean production and integrity management.
